CustomField.formula: (CASE( Messaging__c , '0 - Did not meet AMG standards' , 0, '1 - Met AMG standards' , 1.8, '2 - Exceeded AMG standards' , 2, 0)+ CASE( Intent__c , '0 - Did not meet AMG standards' , 0, '1 - Met AMG standards' , 1.8, '2 - Exceeded AMG standards' , 2, 0)+ CASE( Attention__c , '0 - Did not meet AMG standards' , 0, '1 - Met AMG standards' , 1.8, '2 - Exceeded AMG standards' , 2, 0)+ CASE( Quality__c , '0 - Did not meet AMG standards' , 0, '1 - Met AMG standards' , 1.8, '2 - Exceeded AMG standards' , 2, 0)+ CASE( Audio__c , '0 - Did not meet AMG standards' , 0, '1 - Met AMG standards' , 1.8, '2 - Exceeded AMG standards' , 2, 0))/(10- (CASE( Messaging__c , 'NA',2,0)+ CASE( Intent__c, 'NA',2,0)+ CASE( Attention__c , 'NA',2,0)+ CASE( Quality__c , 'NA',2,0)+ CASE( Audio__c , 'NA',2,0)))
CustomField.label: Video Production Score
